title: PUBG unit sales worldwide 2018
summary: This is a bar chart representing Month in the x axis and Unit sales in millions in the y axis.
The maximum Unit sales in millions 50.0 is found at Month June 2018 and the minimum is found at May 2017 where Month is 2.0.
There is a difference of 48.0 between the maximum Month June 2018 and minimum Month May 2017.
min_summary: This bar chart has 5 columns on the x axis representing Month, and Unit sales in millions in each Month on the y axis.
The Unit sales in millions is appeared to be the highest at Month June 2018 and lowest at Month May 2017.
mid_summary: This is a bar chart representing Month in the x axis and Unit sales in millions in the y axis.
The maximum Unit sales in millions 50.0 is found at Month June 2018 and the minimum is found at May 2017 where Month is 2.0.
There is a difference of 48.0 between the maximum Month June 2018 and minimum Month May 2017.
max_summary: This bar chart has 5 columns on the x axis representing Month, and Unit sales in millions in each Month on the y axis.
The Unit sales in millions is appeared to be the highest at Month June 2018 and lowest at Month May 2017.
Month September 2017 has the second highest value for Unit sales in millions.
The maximum Month June 2018 has got 25.0 times higher Unit sales in millions than the minimum Month May 2017.
Unit sales in millions at Month June 2018 is 50.0 , second place is September 2017 at 10.0, and thirdly is August 2017 at 8.0.
Overall Unit sales in millions has declined over the Months.
The lowest value 2.0 at May 2017 is almost 3.38 times smaller than the average value 14.8.
Summing up the values of all Months, we get total 74.0.
